welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Maia, Portugal! Get ready to experience the charming blend of historical architecture, vibrant culture, and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all that our city has to offer."

restaurants.name: O Industrial
restaurants.description: O Industrial is a portuguese restaurant located in Maia.
restaurants.address: R. José Moreira da Silva, 450, 4470-611 Maia

restaurants.name: Central Churrasco

restaurants.address: Av. Marechal Gomes Costa, 85, 4465-158 S. Mamede de Infesta

restaurants.description: Café Torres is a café located in Ermezinde.

restaurants.description: Paletes Burger Caffé is a burger joint located in Ermezinde.

restaurants.name: McDonald's

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Braga Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
